Package ohos.agp.components

Class LayoutScatter

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.agp.components.LayoutScatter

  • public class LayoutScatter
extends Object
    Provides component conversion tool.

    You can use the tool to define a component in an XML file, and then call the parse(int, ohos.agp.components.ComponentContainer, boolean) method to generate a Component object using this file.

    Since:
    1

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static interface  LayoutScatter.Picker
      Provides a method for checking whether a component can be loaded.

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static LayoutScatter getInstance​(Context context)
        Obtains a LayoutScatter object based on the context.
        Parameters:
        context - Indicates the application context.
        Returns:
        Returns the LayoutScatter object used to convert an XML file to a component.
        Since:
        2

      • clone

        public LayoutScatter clone​(Context context,
                           ResourceManager resourceManager)
        Clones a LayoutScatter object.

        The new LayoutScatter object is cloned using the transferred Context and ResourceManager objects.

        Parameters:
        context - Indicates the Context object of the application.
        resourceManager - Indicates the ResourceManager object of the application.
        Returns:
        Returns the LayoutScatter object.
        Since:
        2

      • parse

        public Component parse​(int xmlId,
                       ComponentContainer root,
                       boolean attachToRoot)
        Converts an XML file to a component.

        After converting an XML file to a component, you can add the new component to a root component, in which case, the root component is returned. Otherwise, the created component is returned.

        Parameters:
        xmlId - Indicates the XML file ID.
        root - Indicates the root component.
        attachToRoot - Indicates whether to add to a root component.
        Returns:
        Returns the component converted from the XML file, which can be either the component itself or a root component (if the component is added to a root component).

      • getPicker

        public LayoutScatter.Picker getPicker​()
        Obtains the component picker.
        Returns:
        Returns the current component picker.
        Since:
        4

      • setPicker

        public void setPicker​(LayoutScatter.Picker picker)
        Sets a new component picker to replace the existing one.
        Parameters:
        picker - Indicates the new component picker to set.
        Since:
        4

      • createComponentElement

        public Component createComponentElement​(String fullClassName,
                                        AttrSet attrSet)
        Instantiates a component based on the fully qualified class name of the component.
        Parameters:
        fullClassName - Indicates the fully qualified class name of the component to be instantiated.
        attrSet - Indicates the XML attribute set provided by this instance.
        Returns:
        Returns the newly instantiated component.
        Since:
        4
